SELECT I.HNAME AS "HNAME", I.OWNER AS "OWNER", I.HEMAIL AS "EMAIL", I.HPHONE AS "PHONE", I.BIZ_NAME AS "BIZ_NAME", I.BIZ_NO AS "BIZ_NO", I.HTEL AS "HTEL", B.CHKIN AS "CHKIN", B.CHKOUT AS "CHKOUT", B.LENT_UNIT AS "LENT_UNIT", C.SVC_RATE AS "SVC_RATE", C.CAL_TIME AS "CAL_TIME", C.VAT_TYPE AS "VAT_TYPE", R.RCONTENT AS "RCONTENT", N.NS_UNIT, N.NS_RATE FROM INFO I JOIN BASIC B ON(I.HNAME = B.HNAME) JOIN CAL C ON (I.HNAME = C.HNAME) JOIN RULE R ON (I.HNAME = R.HNAME) JOIN NOSHOW N ON (I.HNAME = N.HNAME)
